title: Lighted windows: the story of a senior scout troop

description: How a group of Senior Girl Scouts re-opened schools for after hour activities. The Senior Scout Planning Board initiates a survey that reveals a lack of recreational facilities throughout the city. Facts and figures are placed before community leaders and eventually the entire city becomes interested in the situation and a referendum is held. Suggests that individuals develop their personalities through team work and responsibility.
